text: Sum of Subset Problem Find if there is a subset of the given set, sum of whose elements is equal to given sum. * Recurrence Relation: return(S); M=0 return(=1); N=0 SoS(M, N, S) = SoS(M, N-1.5) if wN]1>M Min{SDS(M— wiN], N-1 SUWIND)] . .
